statements: SELECT * FROM RailServicesInventory WHERE product_id = 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM RailServicesInventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM RailServicesInventory WHERE supplier_id = 500 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM RailServicesInventory WHERE price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM RailServicesInventory WHERE supplier_id = 200 AND quantity < 50 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM RailServicesInventory WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM RailServicesInventory WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM RailServicesInventory WHERE supplier_id = 3 ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT * FROM RailServicesInventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%Express%' ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, supplier_id FROM RailServicesInventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY supplier_id DESC
SELECT * FROM rail_inventory
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM rail_inventory WHERE price > 100
SELECT MIN(quantity) AS min_quantity FROM rail_inventory
SELECT id, supplier_name, received_date FROM supply_chain ORDER BY received_date DESC
SELECT supplier_name, price FROM supply_chain, rail_inventory WHERE supply_chain.product_id = rail_inventory.id
SELECT * FROM rail_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM rail_inventory WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price FROM rail_inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM rail_inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%rail%'
SELECT supplier_name, received_date FROM supply_chain WHERE received_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY received_date
SELECT * FROM rail_services;
SELECT service_name, start_station, end_station FROM rail_services ORDER BY service_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM rail_services WHERE frequency < 5;
SELECT * FROM rail_services WHERE frequency > 5 ORDER BY service_name DESC;
SELECT service_name, start_station, end_station FROM rail_services WHERE start_station = 'Station A' AND end_station = 'Station B';
SELECT service_name, start_station, end_station, frequency FROM rail_services WHERE frequency < 3 ORDER BY frequency ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE email LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Railways;
SELECT id, name, location FROM Stations ORDER BY station_name DESC;
SELECT train_id, train_name FROM Trains WHERE railway_id = 1;
SELECT cargo_name, quantity FROM Cargo WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT station_id, station_name, location FROM Stations WHERE station_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY location;
SELECT * FROM Railways ORDER BY name DESC, capacity ASC;
SELECT station_name, location FROM Stations WHERE location='City A';
SELECT t.train_name, r.name, s.station_name FROM Trains t INNER JOIN Railways r ON t.railway_id = r.id INNER JOIN Stations s ON s.station_id = t.railway_id;
SELECT c.cargo_name, c.quantity, s.station_name, r.name FROM Cargo c INNER JOIN Stations s ON c.station_id = s.station_id INNER JOIN Railways r ON r.id = s.station_id WHERE c.quantity > 100;
SELECT r.name, AVG(c.quantity) AS average_quantity FROM Railways r LEFT JOIN Cargo c ON r.id = c.station_id GROUP BY r.name HAVING AVG(c.quantity) > 50;
SELECT * FROM Railways;
SELECT train_name, capacity FROM Trains WHERE railway_id = 1;
SELECT station_name FROM Stations WHERE location = 'City';
SELECT order_id, order_date, product_name, quantity FROM Orders WHERE railway_id = 2 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE station_id IN (SELECT station_id FROM Stations WHERE location = 'Town');
SELECT * FROM Railways;
SELECT railway_name, location FROM Railways WHERE location = 'London';
SELECT train_name, capacity, r.railway_name AS railway_name FROM Trains t INNER JOIN Railways r ON t.railway_id = r.railway_id;
SELECT s.station_name, i.product_name, i.quantity FROM Stations s JOIN Inventory i ON s.station_id = i.station_id WHERE i.quantity > 10;

SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, o.product_name, o.quantity, s.station_name, r.railway_name FROM Orders o JOIN Stations s ON o.station_id = s.station_id JOIN Railways r ON o.railway_id = r.railway_id ORDER BY o.order_id DESC;
